<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Telekinetic Slip](/Feats.aspx?ID=3976) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 45</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
Your turn begins, and you're [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).

</column>

---

A thin shell of telekinetic energy pushes from your skin, widening your enemy's grasp enough for you to slip free. You gain a +2 status bonus to checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) from whatever has you grabbed or restrained. This bonus lasts until either you're no longer grabbed or restrained, or you fall [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
name: Telekinetic Slip
